issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Add format_number hive function to gandiva
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13331](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13331). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Formats the number X to a format like '#,###,###.##', rounded to D decimal places, and returns the result as a string. If D is 0, the result has no decimal point or fractional part.
